name: (Prototype) Lazer Defender
description:
NOTE: This game is only made for  a prototype and Portfolio.

Make sure to play it at fullscreen.

How to play :

  1. Press W,A,S,D to move the aircraft.
  2. Press Space to shoot.
  3. Go for the highest score as possible!!
  4. Have fun and good luck!

A prototype made by:
Kevin Leonardrich (Smickal)
